title: Sales Closer / Lead Conversion Specialist
job_overview:
We’re a performance marketing agency seeking a Sales Closer who understands the industry and can effectively convert warm leads into paying clients. You’ll chat with leads on Telegram, WhatsApp, or scheduled calls — no cold outreach, just people already interested in what we do.

Must-Have Experience:
 • Proven experience in performance marketing (this is a must – please don’t apply if you haven’t worked in this space)
 • Strong English communication (spoken + written)
 • Ability to close deals for service-based offers
 • Comfortable using Telegram, WhatsApp, Calendly, Google Sheets, etc.
 • Highly organised and self-driven

Bonus If You’ve Closed in Niches Like:
 • Crypto
 • Gambling
 • Forex / financial offers
 • Restricted or blackhat-friendly niches

Work Schedule:
 • Full-time role (40 hrs/week)
 • You’ll need to be available on weekends (Saturday + Sunday)
 • You can take 1-2 weekdays off of your choice
 • Flexible hours — make sure leads are responded to quickly and professionally

???? What You Get:
 • Base salary + bonuses for every closed deal
 • Stable long-term work with room to grow
 • Freedom to work from anywhere

If you’re already in performance marketing and can handle lead conversion like a pro, apply now.
